messages.message: Are we ocrizing QR code ? Birthdate is returned but is not on the document

I believe not. @Hari can confirm.

@Léo Do we know if this is the expected date of birth, or this is a case of LLM hallucinating?
I don't, but you are right it must be allucination since the QR code don't seem to be valid

Makes sense! It is a good example to help us figure out how to improve our guard rails against hallucinations. Can you share the sample document? Thanks.

cc: @Bastiane @lydia
Looks like its got the number from the vertical text on the left hand side, rather than invented it
Worth checking, because the vertical text has the first six digits as 210291 while the model extracted 21/02/1990 as the DOB
